title: Indian Hotels Co Ltd signs its third hotel in Ayodhya
description: Indian Hotels Company (IHCL) has signed an agreement to open a third hotel in Ayodhya, Uttar Pradesh. The brownfield project will be branded as an IHCL SeleQtions hotel and is part of IHCL's strategy to establish a significant presence in spiritual destinations. The 150-key hotel will feature various dining options, a spa, swimming pool, fitness center, and over 10,000 square feet of banqueting space.
